subtitleNullable: 1,000 Images per Class: Convertible, Coupe, Hatchback, Pick-Up, SUV, Sedan, VAN
descriptionNullable:
## **Description:**
This dataset is a comprehensive collection of images depicting various car body types, including **Convertible**, **Coupe**, **Hatchback**, **Pick-Up**, **SUV**, **Sedan**, and **VAN**. It has been meticulously curated and organized to facilitate the training and evaluation of machine learning models for car body type classification.

## **Dataset Overview:**
- **Total Number of Classes**: 7 (Convertible, Coupe, Hatchback, Pick-Up, SUV, Sedan, VAN)
- **Total Number of Images**: Approximately 7,000 images (1,000 images per class)
- **Dataset Split**: The dataset is divided into three subsets: Training, Testing, and Validation. Each class contains approximately 1,000 images, equally distributed among these subsets.
- **Image Variability**: Images in this dataset vary in terms of quality, resolution, lighting conditions, and angles, ensuring a robust and diverse set of samples for model training and testing.

## **Citation:**
If you use this dataset in your work or publications, please consider citing it to give credit to the dataset creator.
